Darkvision: R60' Sees one light level better
Timeless Body (Druid): Ages at 1/10 normal rate
Trance: 4 hr meditation gives the benefits of 8 hr sleep

Druidic: Speaks a secret language known only by druids
Combat
Hit Points: 71 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 13 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Club; Dagger; Dart; Javelin; Longbow; Longsword; Mace; Quarterstaff; Scimitar; Shortbow; Shortsword; Sickle; Sling; Spear
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Club (+9 1d4+3); Javelin (+9 1d6+3 R30/120); Shortbow (+7 1d6+1 R80/320); Unarmed (+9 1+3)
Combat Notes:
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Elf Weapon Training: Weapon Proficiency (Longbow; Longsword; Shortbow; Shortsword)
Incarnation Of Corruption: +2 Armor Class
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Damage Adjustment: +3
Defile Ground: R60' 20' radius can move 30' per rd, creates difficult terrain for foes, and inflicts +1d8 HP necrotic from the first hit on each creature each turn, for 1 min once per short rest
Great Weapon Master: Can use a bonus action to attack after scoring a critical hit or reducing a foe to 0 hit points with a melee weapon/Can make a -5 attack with a heavy weapon to inflict +10 damage
Incarnation Of Corruption: Can use a bonus action to gain 6 temporary hit points when within Defile Ground radius
Polearm Master: Can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of a polearm, inflicting 1d4 HP bludgeoning, and a foe entering polearm reach provokes an opportunity attack
Savage Attacker: Can take the best of two melee damage rolls once per rd
Save Proficiency: Intelligence; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 0; Dexterity: 1; Intelligence: 8; Strength: 3; Wisdom: 7
Save Notes:
Fey Ancestry: Has advantage vs. charm and immunity to magical sleep
Incarnation Of Corruption: Has resistance to necrotic damage
Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 4; D1: 4; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 2; D7: 2; D8: 1; D9: 1; W0: 1 Attack: D: 7; W: 8 Spell DC: D: 15; W: 16
Spells:
Animal Friendship (D1 Ench): R30' Convinces target beast that self is harmless (save Wisdom negates; Intelligence 4 or higher immune) for 1 day or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Antilife Shell (D5 Abju): 10' radius prevents the passage of living creatures for concentration up to 1 hr
Beast Sense (D2 Divi): Self can perceive through a touched willing beast's senses for concentration up to 1 hr [R]
Conjure Fey (D6 Conj): R90' Summons an obedient CR 6 fey for 1 hr; loss of concentration makes it hostile [+Level increases the CR by 1]
Control Water (D4 Tran): R300' Water in a 100' cube rises 20', parts, redirects, or forms a whirlpool for concentration up to 10 min
Darkvision (D2 Tran): Willing touched sees 60' in darkness for 8 hr
Detect Magic (D1 Divi): R30' Reveals magic auras and their schools for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Feeblemind (D8 Ench): R150' Target suffers 4d6 HP psychic and reduction of Charisma and Intelligence to 1 (save Intelligence HP only; failure allows additional saves every 30 days)
Fire Storm (D7 Evoc): R150' 10 connected 10' cubes inflict 7d10 HP fire (save Dexterity half) and ignite unattended flammable objects
Flame Blade (D2 Evoc): Self wields a flaming blade that inflicts 3d6 HP fire and lights a 10' radius for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP per 2 levels]
Fog Cloud (D1 Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level increases the radius by 20']
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Geas (D5 Ench): R60' Target obeys self instructions (save Wisdom negates) for 30 days [+Level extends the duration to 1 yr or permanently at level 7 or 9]
Grasping Vine (D4 Conj): R30' 30' vine pulls the target 20' each rd (save Dexterity negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Guidance (D0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check within concentration up to 1 min
Ice Storm (D4 Evoc): R300' 20' radius inflicts 2d8 HP bludgeoning and 4d6 HP cold (save Dexterity half) and becomes difficult terrain for 1 rd [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP bludgeoning]
Mass Cure Wounds (D5 Evoc): R60' 6 targets in a 30' radius regain 3d8+1 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Meld Into Stone (D3 Tran): Self steps into rock, losing sight and muffling hearing but allowing casting spells on self, for up to 8 hr [R]
Mending (D0 Tran): Touch repairs a break or tear up to 1 ft
Poison Spray (D0 Conj): R10' Inflicts 4d12 HP poison (save Constitution negates)
Protection From Energy (D3 Abju): Touched gains resistance to a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Resistance (D0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save within concentration up to 1 min
Reverse Gravity (D7 Tran): R100' Items in a 50' radius fall upward for concentration up to 1 min
Shapechange (D9 Tran): Polymorphs self into a familiar living creature of equal or lesser CR for concentration up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Shillelagh (D0 Tran): Held club inflicts +7 magical attacks and 1d8+1 HP damage for 1 min
Thunderwave (D1 Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (save Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Transport Via Plants (D6 Conj): R10' Allows creatures to teleport from a large plant target to another for 1 rd
Wind Wall (D3 Evoc): R120' Creates a 50'x15'x1' area that inflicts 3d8 HP bludgeoning (save Strength half) and deflects lightweight creatures and objects for concentration up to 1 min
Magic Notes:
Archdruid: Can use Wild Shape at will
Cantrip (High Elf): Knows 1 Wizard cantrip
Archdruid: Casting spells requires no verbal, somatic, or cost-free material components
Beast Spells: Can cast spells during Wild Shape
Blighted Shape: Wild Shape gives +2 armor class and 60' darkvision
Call Of The Shadowseeds: Can use a reaction after a creature takes damage within the Defile Ground area to summon a blighted sapling (armor class 16; 40 hit points; +7 attack inflicts 2d4+6 HP piercing) adjacent to it 6 times per long rest
Flash Recall: Can replace a prepared spell once per short rest
Foul Conjuration: Summoned creatures gain immunity to necrotic damage, poison damage, and the poisoned condition and produce a R5' toxic shower that inflicts 1d4+ HP necrotic (save Constitution negates) when killed or commanded
Spell Sniper: Can cast attack spells at double normal range/Spells ignore 3/4 cover/Knows an additional attack cantrip
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the druid spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Wild Shape: Can transform into a CR 1 creature for 10 hr unlimited times per short rest
